li.label: angelic beauty
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] possesses an unnatural, almost pristine beauty that makes [PAWN_objective] stand out among others of [PAWN_possessive] kind.

li.label: repulsive
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is so unfathomably ugly and grotesque that merely looking at [PAWN_objective] is enough to make other people nauseous.
